name: DodgeCube (Blind Faith Studio)
description:
YOU are the CUBE!

Your mission: DODGE!

-----------------

Dodge left and right using 'A' and 'D' keys on your keyboard, but don't fall off the edge!

A few quick levels of increasing difficulty, and you're done!

More levels may be added in future if there's interest.

-----------------

DodgeCube is Blind Faith Studio's FIRST EVER game! Created in Unity with C# and lots of tutorials (thank you Brackeys!), it will forever stand as an example that ANYBODY can create games.

Go forth and play!
